attributes.action: investigate turning off unsed street lamps across UK between 1am to 5am everyday
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Switching off street lamps automatically or via a timer between 1am and 5am, this would help the UK reduce its carbon emissions and save money. Most people are a sleep at this time; you could have exclusions for City Centre areas. Local Authorities / Government could implement as big bang approach or rollout gradually and implement when street lights are serviced or repaired.
Kash Walayat
